item_name_item_name: The North Face Mittelegi Full Zip Woven Hoodie
item_name_description:
Step up your look in JD-exclusive style with this men's Mittelegi Full Zip Woven Hoodie from The North Face. In a navy colourway, this regular-fit hoodie is made from smooth poly fabric for laidback, off-duty comfort. It features a full zip fastening, an adjustable hood and woven overlays for added durability. With two side pockets and a zip pocket to the chest for your essentials, this hoodie is finished with reflective The North Face branding. Machine washable. | Our model is 6'0" with a 39" chest and wears a size medium.
Care & Material
100% Polyester
